author: legoguy2805
title: Servant of Teridax!
review:
I got this off Ebay for £3 in 2007. In the storyline, Fikou can spin very strong webs and they also have poisionous bites. For some time, Teridax controlled the Fikou, along with other Rahi, with Infected Masks. (That's why it's got a mask on its back.) Anyway, the review:

Pros:
Good colour scheme
Infected (Orange) Kanohi Pakari, Mask of Strength
Claws
Stands up very well

Cons:
Mask falls off easily
Head falls off easily

Overall, 4/5 because it gets annoying when the head falls off all the time.

author: legoguy_3000_
title: great for a promo
review:
This is a great set for a promo.  It is like a spider but orange.

pros:
cool mask
cool claws
great for a promo
free
easy to build
good color scheme

cons:
nothing

I think this is a very cool set 5/5

author: hustla187
title: Good Promo
review: This is an OK promo for a Bionicle set. It looks alot like a spider but I don't like the mask as part of the "spider". I also think that it could be black. Besides that, this is pretty good for a promo.

author: legoandy
title: I can already build this, yeah!
review:
Did you know you can easily build this out of Onua Mata and Pohatu Mata. Try it it's fun!
I like this set though it's a cute flexible one. No bad parts and is a great wee make- shift rahi in all. I wouldn't moan about not getting this set, because you can easily make out of Onua and Pohatu.

5/5
100%

author: catwheeler
title: The amazing tree spider fikou
review: I got the set used from bricklink and he has an articulated head. And it's neat how      they used a bionicle mask for the egg sack. The legs are made from bionicle claws. The instructions are great. And the polybag/packaging was o.k. I am also a spider fan.

author: LEGOMinifigures1997
title: Nice little complement for your Bionicle collection
review:
I bought this set in a local toy store in the Netherlands for â‚¬0,50, which is very cheap.

It's a little orange Bionicle spider and a great complement for your Bionicle collection, especially when you buy more of this set.

Pros

  • Nice complement for your Bionicle collection
  • Very cheap
  • Looks good

Cons

  • The back of the spider falls off easily
  • Small, but that's the meaning of this set so it doesn't really matter


Summary, this is a nice set to have for a little price.

author: Nmfrey23
title: Cute world-building spider
review:
Fikou is an interesting little set. Despite the low piece count this set pulls off the adorable look well, and is a neat little promotional set.

Pros:

.Unique coloration

.Claws are new in orange

.Uncommon (not new) orange Pakari 

.Ball joint for head movement

Cons:

.Poor movement overall

.Mask sometimes pops off

For a promotional set, fairly decent. 3/5
